Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Sleepwalking \Sleep"walk`ing\, n. Walking in one's sleep. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Somnambulation \Som*nam`bu*la"tion\, n. [L. somnus sleep + ambulatio a walking about, from ambulare to walk. See {Somnolent}, {Amble}.] The act of walking in sleep, called also {sleepwalking}. [1913 Webster]
sleepwalking n : walking by a person who is asleep [syn: {somnambulism}, {somnambulation}, {noctambulism}, {noctambulation}]
